thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 3 of 265
thread.title: Tracey

author: Tracey
title: Tracey
text: As a Kindergarten teacher who is currently single, I am often too exhausted after dealing all day with 5-year-olds to cook myself dinner. Before Hello Fresh, it was Hello Drive Thrus and Hello Take-Out 7 days a week. Hello Fresh has afforded me several positive things. First, I am learning to cook "real" food like I would get at a restaurant. Second, my niece is a budding chef so she loves to sleepover and help me cook a meal. Third, I have gotten 4 people to join already because of how much I am enjoying the food and learning how to cook...which saves me even more money on future boxes! That's why I think you should change the name from HELLO FRESH to HELLO AWESOME!
